snippet: Steve Stricker, Jim Furyk, Dustin Johnson and Brandt Snedeker were the four discretionary picks for the U.S. Ryder Cup team.
abstract: United States Ryder Cup captain Davis Love III names Steve Stricker, Jim Furyk, Dustin Johnson and Brandt Snedeker as his four discretionary picks.
lead_paragraph: Steve Stricker, Jim Furyk, Dustin Johnson and Brandt Snedeker were the four discretionary picks for the U.S. Ryder Cup team.

headline.seo: Steve Stricker, Jim Furyk, Dustin Johnson and Brandt Snedeker Fill Out U.S. Ryder Cup Team
headline.main: Two Veterans and Two Closers Fill Out U.S. Ryder Cup Team
headline.print_headline: Two Veterans and Two Closers Fill Out U.S. Ryder Cup Team
